me.champeau.ld

Class GramTreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.champeau.ld.AbstractGramTree
      • me.champeau.ld.GramTreeBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GramTreeBuilder
extends AbstractGramTree
    A gram tree is used to learn n-grams from texts, and is able to score a text. The n-gram data is represented as a lexical tree. The representation is rather compact, but one could do better with annotated-DFAs.

    Not thread-safe.

    Author:
    Cedric CHAMPEAU
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
